medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain after heavy binge drinking and trauma to the upper abdomen.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The symptoms began one day after a heavy binge drinking episode and an episode of trauma to the upper abdomen. The patient has been experiencing progressively worsening hypoxia and low urine output (UOP) since admission.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic inflammatory demyelinating polyneuropathy diagnosed; anxiety.
medical_history.family_history: No known family history of hepatobiliary disorder; grandmother with hypertension and diabetes; one cousin with Bell's palsy and another cousin with cystinosis.
